sections.heading: Receivers; extent of representation
sections.text: Every receiver shall be considered the receiver of any party to the suit, and no others.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 273, p. 439;R.S.1913, § 7817;C.S.1922, § 8761;C.S.1929, § 20-1088;R.S.1943, § 25-1088.AnnotationsCourt has no power to appoint even temporary receiver fo
